product_name: Louis Garneau Factory Bike Jersey - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Take to the road in the men's Factory Bike Jersey from Louis Garneau and watch your performance take off. Polyester jersey wicks sweat off your skin and dries fast. Full-length front zipper maximizes venting. 3 angled back pockets offer easy access; reflective pocket trim enhances visibility. Louis Garneau Factory Bike Jersey for men has elastic at the hem to secure the fit. Closeout.
short_description: Take to the road in the men's Factory Bike Jersey from Louis Garneau and watch your performance take off.
